messages.subject: conference CDs and MP3
messages.msgSnippet: CDs and the MP3 are now available on the website. www.liveandlearnconference.org  Click on Resources. They forgot to send Pam s Einstein CD, but it will be
messages.messageBody:
CDs and the MP3 are now available on the website. www.liveandlearnconference.org Click on Resources. They forgot to send Pam's Einstein CD, but it will be here shortly.

CDs are mostly $10 each. They combined my talk with Ben's, so you can get two for $15. They also combined two of Anne's talks---same deal. Pam & Roya's together was almost two hours---it's a two CD set for $15.

Bumper stickers are $2 each. T-shirts are $10 for youth and $12 for adult sizes---the available sizes are listed. We also have a few tapes from years one and two at a greatly reduced price! Snatch 'em up!

You can order online and pay via PayPal or snail mail the form and pay by check---or any combination! <g>


~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
